import React from 'react'; const Registration = () => { // These sports and links are placeholders - replace with actual registration links const sportsEvents = [ { name: "Football", link: "https://forms.example.com/football" }, { name: "Cricket", link: "https://forms.example.com/cricket" }, { name: "Basketball", link: "https://forms.example.com/basketball" }, { name: "Volleyball", link: "https://forms.example.com/volleyball" }, { name: "Table Tennis", link: "https://forms.example.com/table-tennis" }, { name: "Badminton", link: "https://forms.example.com/badminton" }, { name: "Chess", link: "https://forms.example.com/chess" }, { name: "Carrom", link: "https://forms.example.com/carrom" }, { name: "Athletics", link: "https://forms.example.com/athletics" }, ]; return (

Registration

Sports Event Registration

Register for your favorite sports events by clicking on the registration buttons below. Make sure to submit your details before the registration deadline!

{sportsEvents.map((sport, index) => (

{sport.name}

Register
))}

Registration Guidelines

  • Registration is open to all hostel students of BITS Pilani Dubai Campus.
  • Each student can register for a maximum of 3 sports events.
  • Team events require all team members to be from the same hostel.
  • For team events, only the team captain needs to register the team.
  • Registration deadline is September 15, 2024.
  • For any queries regarding registration, please contact the Recharge organizing committee.
); }; export default Registration;
